properties.name: log.threshold
properties.description: The time is milliseconds that a method must take in order to be logged.

properties.name: dev
properties.description: Whether to run in development mode or not. Must be 'true' to run in development mode.

properties.name: health.unstable-threshold
properties.description: The threshold when to switch a service from health 'UP' to health 'UNSTABLE' in percentages. The base value is the total count of calls, the percentage value is the count of failed calls.
